definition: to print/to publish/publication/periodical/to peel with a knife/to carve/to amend

sentences.english: The results will be reported in scientific journals in the near future" , said Dr Vallotton."
sentences.chinese: 不久的將來，其結果將會發表在學術刊物上。

sentences.english: She has contributed to literary magazines.
sentences.chinese: 她給幾家文學刊物投了稿。

sentences.english: For instance, some clandestine publications are beautifully produced. Well, where did the paper come from?
sentences.chinese: 舉例說，有些祕密刊物印得那麼漂亮，哪兒來的紙？

sentences.english: Other journals that had carried subsequent high-profile papers from Dr Potti behaved in similar ways.
sentences.chinese: 其它後來發表了波提博士高調論文的刊物也一樣。

sentences.english: Dynamics of ecosystem science. Requires paid subscription.
sentences.chinese: 描述生態系統的刊物，需要預付定金。

sentences.english: He is a regular contributor to children's magazines.
sentences.chinese: 他經常爲兒童刊物寫稿。

sentences.english: Their pamphlets and magazines enjoyed a very small circulation.
sentences.chinese: 他們所出的小冊子和刊物發行數非常少。

sentences.english: There are mistakes in the errata, which means that the quality of this publication is not good.
sentences.chinese: 正誤表中還有錯誤，說明此刊物質量不好。

sentences.english: Pornographic publications remain illegal, but sex toy shops can be found everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 黃色刊物屬於非法，但性用品商店到處都是。

sentences.english: Some antievolution authors have published papers in serious journals.
sentences.chinese: 有些反對進化論的作者曾在嚴肅刊物上發表過論文。

sentences.english: Bernoulli's essay was published in Latin as an article in a scholarlyvolume.[1]
sentences.chinese: 伯努利的論文以拉丁文發表在一個學院刊物上。

sentences.english: But there was no movement in the readership of the publication.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在刊物的讀者當中卻並沒有這樣的影響。

sentences.english: In the national and the provincial and ministerial level publications published scores of papers.
sentences.chinese: 先後在國家級及省部級刊物上發表論文幾十篇。

sentences.english: I have read and understood the Principal Brochure.
sentences.chinese: 本人已閱讀並明白主要推銷刊物的內容。

sentences.english: PolyU Milestones is The Hong Kong Polytechnic University magazine published by the Communications and Public Affairs Office.
sentences.chinese: 是香港理工大學刊物，由傳訊及公共事務處編印出版。

sentences.english: Part of its corporate image design and internal publications.
sentences.chinese: 爲其設計部分企業形象及內部刊物。

definition: to carry a story/to publish (in a newspaper or magazine)
to start publishing/to found a journal
